column1: Magnetic resonance image (MRI) size (128, 256, 1) capturing the head of a man aged  of 37 years old, with a sequence weighted in T2 and sagittal section. The specific slice is number 116, counted from the right hemisphere of the skull. The observed details include the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4350.5859 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 5190.3809 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 297.9492 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 535.2539 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1596.5332 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 460.1074 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 238.6230 mm³, the left globus pallidus of volume 2.6367 mm³, the brainstem of volume 639.4043 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 5.2734 mm³, the left nucleus accumbens of volume 67.2363 mm³ and the left ventral diencephalon of volume 191.1621 mm³.
